entry.p: Here are some of my goals for 2014:

ul.li: Complete all of the specifications I'm currently working on in the XMPP, STOX, PRECIS, UTA, and URNBIS working groups at the IETF.
Make good progress on the TLS 1.3 spec, which I'll be helping Eric Rescorla to produce in the IETF's TLS working group.
Resist taking on any new IETF-related tasks for awhile.
Form a cooperative to provide an organizational structure (and funding source) for the jabber.org IM service.
Finish translating everything that Epicurus said on the nature of the good life, and publish the results as a short book.
Write more code, especially on projects related to private messaging and Internet security.
Play more music, and record more of what I play.
Spend more time with friends and family.
